articles.description: Pistol shooters have won two medals in the ongoing Paris Games. Manu Bhaker won a Bronze in the individual 10m air pistol before combining with Sarabjot Singh to claim the mixed team third position.
articles.content: 'History Maker': After Manu Bhaker's Paris Paris Olympics Show, Abhinav Bindra, RCB Celebrate Twin Bronzes
